company.name: Ascent Group Construction
company.missionStatement: We combine Canadian craftsmanship with cutting-edge technology to deliver construction projects that exceed expectations. From small renovations to large-scale developments, we bring integrity, innovation, and expertise to every build.
company.vision: To be Canada's most trusted construction-management partner, known for delivering complex projects on time, on budget, and with exceptional quality.

team.name: John Martinez
team.bio: With over 25 years in construction management and a portfolio spanning commercial, institutional, and industrial projects, John founded Ascent Group in 2009. His vision: to combine the trusted practices of Canada's leading builders with modern technology and client-first service. Under his leadership, Ascent has delivered over 500 projects across the GTA.

team.name: Sarah Chen, P.Eng.
team.bio: Sarah brings 18 years of structural and civil engineering expertise to Ascent Group. She leads our preconstruction and VDC teams, leveraging Autodesk Construction Cloud and Bluebeam to optimize project delivery. Her innovative approach has reduced rework by 40% across our portfolio.

team.name: Michael Thompson
team.bio: Michael oversees day-to-day operations across all active job sites, ensuring quality, safety, and schedule adherence. With 20 years in field supervision and site management, he's built a reputation for running tight, efficient projects. His teams consistently achieve zero lost-time incidents.

team.name: David Kowalski
team.bio: David leads our estimating, budgeting, and scheduling teams. His accurate cost projections and value-engineering insights have saved clients millions. He specializes in CM at Risk and Design-Build delivery, ensuring projects start on solid financial footing.

team.name: Jennifer Lee
team.bio: Jennifer ensures every client receives exceptional service from initial consultation through project closeout. Her proactive communication and problem-solving have earned Ascent a 98% client satisfaction rating and countless referrals.

team.name: Robert Garcia
team.bio: Robert's primary focus is keeping our teams and your property safe. With 15 years in construction safety and risk management, he implements protocols that exceed industry standards. His leadership has helped Ascent achieve 500+ projects with zero lost-time incidents.

values.title: Excellence in Execution
values.description: We deliver on our promises. Every project—no matter the size—receives the same commitment to quality, precision, and craftsmanship.

values.title: Transparent Communication
values.description: Clear, honest updates at every stage. No surprises, just straightforward collaboration with real-time insights via Procore and shared dashboards.

values.title: Safety First, Always
values.description: 500+ projects with zero lost-time incidents. Comprehensive safety protocols protect our teams and your property on every job site.

values.title: Innovation & Technology
values.description: We leverage Autodesk Construction Cloud, Bluebeam, and BIM coordination to reduce rework, improve accuracy, and deliver projects faster.

values.title: Client Partnership
values.description: Your success is our success. We collaborate closely with clients, architects, and trades to ensure your vision becomes reality—on time and on budget.

values.title: Sustainable Building
values.description: LEED-certified expertise and sustainable practices that reduce environmental impact while delivering long-term value for your investment.

sustainability.commitment: At Ascent Group Construction, we're committed to sustainable building practices that protect our environment while delivering exceptional long-term value.

initiatives.title: LEED & Green Certification
initiatives.description: Our team includes LEED Accredited Professionals who guide projects through sustainable design, energy-efficient systems, and green material selection.

initiatives.title: Waste Diversion & Recycling
initiatives.description: Comprehensive job-site recycling programs for concrete, metal, wood, and drywall. Partnerships with local recyclers minimize landfill waste.
initiatives.impact: 85% waste diversion rate across all projects

initiatives.title: Energy-Efficient Systems
initiatives.description: High-performance building envelopes, advanced HVAC systems, and renewable energy integration reduce operational costs and carbon footprint.
initiatives.impact: Average 30% energy cost reduction for clients

initiatives.title: Local & Sustainable Sourcing
initiatives.description: Partner with local suppliers and specify materials with recycled content, low embodied carbon, and third-party sustainability certifications.

initiatives.title: Water Conservation
initiatives.description: Low-flow fixtures, rainwater harvesting systems, and efficient irrigation reduce water consumption across commercial and institutional projects.
initiatives.impact: 40% reduction in water usage vs. baseline

safety.commitment: Safety isn't just a priority—it's our core value. Every team member goes home safe, every day. Our industry-leading safety record speaks for itself.

programs.title: Daily Safety Briefings
programs.description: Every project starts with a comprehensive safety meeting covering site-specific hazards, protocols, and emergency procedures.

programs.title: COR Certification
programs.description: Certificate of Recognition (COR) certified, demonstrating our commitment to health and safety excellence and WSIB compliance.

programs.title: Ongoing Training
programs.description: Regular safety training sessions keep our team updated on best practices, new regulations, and advanced techniques.

programs.title: Personal Protective Equipment
programs.description: All team members equipped with task-appropriate PPE, inspected regularly for compliance and effectiveness.

programs.title: Fall Protection & Elevated Work
programs.description: OSHA and WSIB-compliant fall protection for all elevated work, including scaffolding, harnesses, guardrails, and aerial lifts.

programs.title: Site Inspections & Audits
programs.description: Regular safety audits and third-party inspections ensure ongoing compliance and identify potential hazards before they become issues.

programs.title: Emergency Preparedness
programs.description: All supervisors certified in First Aid/CPR with site-specific emergency response plans and designated assembly areas.

stats.zeroIncidents: 500+ projects completed with zero lost-time incidents

history.founding: Founded in 2009 by John Martinez, Ascent Group began as a small general contractor focused on residential renovations in the Greater Toronto Area. Inspired by the collaborative approaches of Canada's industry leaders—Bird Construction's century of trust, PCL's employee-owned model, and EllisDon's diversified expertise—John built Ascent on a foundation of quality, transparency, and client partnership.

milestones.description: John Martinez establishes Ascent Group Construction with a vision to combine traditional craftsmanship with modern technology.
Successfully delivered a $2M office renovation, marking our entry into commercial construction.
Team members achieve LEED AP credentials, expanding our sustainable building capabilities.
Earned Certificate of Recognition for health and safety excellence.
Implemented Procore, Autodesk Construction Cloud, and Bluebeam across all projects.
Secured first institutional project—a $15M healthcare facility renovation.
Celebrated 500+ completed projects with zero lost-time incidents and 98% client satisfaction.
